Hello and welcome! My name is Anton and in this video, we will talk about the strange bugs called treehoppers and why they look so weird because of their pronotum

3:10 Mimicry and visual signals? 
4:10 Apparently the effects are electric!

14:00 Electr
title: Biologists Figured Out Why Treehoppers Look So Weird
